item.title: Someone please help! i got error :( dunno how to fix
item.dc:creator: @RippersRipped RippersRipped
item.description:
@RippersRipped wrote:

It’s missing alot of variables, did you paste some raw code in from another source? Maybe this source was Czar base, and you’re trying to copy it to a Delta base = fail.

Read full topic
